original_text: It was the ninth month, and the king was sitting in the winter house, and there was a fire burning in the fire pot before him.
korean_text: 그 때는 아홉째 달이라 왕이 겨울 궁전에 앉았고 그 앞에는 불 피운 화로가 있더라

sentences.original_text: and the king was sitting in the winter house
and there was a fire burning in the fire pot before him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 앞에는 화로에 불이 타고 있었다.
